        self.retranslateUi(Digital_Clock)
        QtCore.QMetaObject.connectSlotsByName(Digital_Clock)

    def show(self):
        while True:
            QApplication.processEvents()
            dt = datetime.datetime.now()
            self.textBrowser.setText('Date:- %s:%s:%s' % (dt.day, dt.month, dt.year))
            self.textBrowser_2.setText('Time:- %s:%s:%s' % (dt.hour, dt.minute, dt.second))


    def retranslateUi(self, Digital_Clock):
        _translate = QtCore.QCoreApplication.translate
        Digital_Clock.setWindowTitle(_translate("Digital_Clock", "Digital_Clock"))
        self.pushButton.setText(_translate("Digital_Clock", "Show Time"))
